TopicTitle: Mk3 engine plate and symmetry mode?

Articles.Content:
I would like to confirm whether the behavior is either a still existing bug or expected behavior, and not some operato (IE my) error:

  • When a craft is reloaded with Mk3 engine plate in VAB,
  • if items are placed on the black end using the mirror symmetry mode in the last save
  • using either move tool or rotation tool will change it back to radial symmetry.
Edited May 5, 2019 by Jestersage
